name: Vessels 162: KONK
description:
Unlike his half-brother Donk, Konk prefers to fight people up close and personal, bludgeoning his enemies with one of his many hammers. Konk has a hammer for every occasion, from his mallet for fighting large foes right down to a small toffee hammer that he uses for a little light torture and also breaking apart toffee.

Konk’s battle cry of ‘It’s Hammer time!’ - inspired by a legendary piece of 20th century classical music that is still studied and revered by humanity even in this far-flung future - strikes fear into the hearts of all who hear it, shortly before Konk’s hammer strikes them rather more literally and with rather more finality.
